item.title: Docker
item.description: Docker is a set of platform as a service (PaaS) products which uses OS-level virtualization to deliver software in a container .

item.title: Docker Commands
item.description: Installation One click installation script: 1 2 curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com -o get-docker.sh sudo sh get-docker.sh Run docker as non root user:

item.title: Docker Compose
item.description: Docker compose is used to run multiple docker containers at once Networking By default Docker-Compose will create a new network for the given compose file.

item.title: Docker FIle
item.description: A docker file is a text document that contains all the commands a user could call on the command line to assemble an docker image.
